section.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Supported Hardware
section.p: The following hardware has been tested and verified to work with HP Helion OpenStack 2.0:

ul.li: BL420c Gen8 (supported with P-series Smart Array only)
DL360 Gen8

section.title: HP Moonshot Servers

ul.li: m710 Server Cartridges (compute node only)

section.p: For more information, see Managing Moonshot Servers.

ul.li: SL230s Gen8
SL250s Gen8

body.p: For more information about independent hardware vendor (IHV) supported hardware, see the HP Helion Ready Solution Catalog.
